history.proof: intros. unfold RInt. unfold is_RInt. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing
f: R -> V
b: R
a: R

Goal:
ex_RInt f a b -> is_RInt f a b (RInt f a b)

Premises:
RInt = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => iota (is_RInt f a b) : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
is_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally If) : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
ex_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => exists If : V, is_RInt f a b If : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Notation CompleteNormedModule := CompleteNormedModule.type
*** [ R : Set ]
is_RInt_unique : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f a b l -> RInt f a b = l
filterlim_ext : forall f0 g : ?T -> ?U, (forall x : ?T, f0 x = g x) -> filterlim f0 ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type] ?U : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type] ?F : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_const : forall a0 : ?U, filterlim (fun _ : ?T => a0) ?F (locally a0) where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type] ?U : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- UniformSpace] ?F : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Filter ?F]
ex_RInt_swap : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 -> ex_RInt f0 b0 a0 where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
is_RInt_swap : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R) (If : ?V), is_RInt f0 b0 a0 If -> is_RInt f0 a0 b0 (opp If) where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
is_RInt_point : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 : R), is_RInt f0 a0 a0 zero where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
ex_RInt_Chasles_2 : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 c : R), a0 <= b0 <= c -> ex_RInt f0 a0 c -> ex_RInt f0 b0 c where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
ex_RInt_Chasles_1 : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 c : R), a0 <= b0 <= c -> ex_RInt f0 a0 c -> ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type] ?F : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Filter ?F]
ex_RInt_point : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 : R), ex_RInt f0 a0 a0 where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
filterlim_RInt : forall (f0 : ?U -> R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R) (F : (?U -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter F -> forall (g : fct_UniformSpace R ?V) (h : ?U -> ?V), (forall x : ?U, is_RInt (f0 x) a0 b0 (h x)) -> filterlim f0 F (locally g) -> exists If : ?V, filterlim h F (locally If) /\ is_RInt g a0 b0 If where ?U : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
Riemann_fine_unif_part : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (forall a0 b0 : R, a0 <= b0 -> a0 <= f a0 b0 <= b0) -> a <= b -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) <= (b - a) / (INR n + 1) /\ pointed_subdiv (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) /\ SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) = a /\ last (SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) = b
filter_ex : forall P : SF_seq -> Prop, Riemann_fine ?a ?b P -> exists x : SF_seq, P x where ?a : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- R] ?b : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- R]
scal_one : forall u : ?V, scal one u = u where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Ring] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- ModuleSpace ?K]
ex_RInt_comp_opp : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), ex_RInt f0 (- a0) (- b0) -> ex_RInt (fun y : R => opp (f0 (- y))) a0 b0 where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
SF_map_lx : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_map f0 s) = SF_lx s where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type] ?T0 : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
SF_size_map : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_size (SF_map f0 s) = SF_size s where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type] ?T0 : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
filterlim_opp : forall x : ?V, filterlim opp (locally x) (locally (opp x)) where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- NormedModule ?K]
ex_RInt_inside : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 x e : R), ex_RInt f0 (x - e) (x + e) -> Rabs (a0 - x) <= e -> Rabs (b0 - x) <= e -> ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
norm_compat1 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_compat2 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> norm (minus y x) < norm_factor * eps where ?K : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- NormedModule ?K]
SF_map_ly : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_ly (SF_map f0 s) = [seq f0 i | i <- SF_ly s] where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type] ?T0 : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
filterlim_locally_cauchy : forall f0 : SF_seq -> ?U, (forall eps : posreal, exists P : SF_seq -> Prop, Riemann_fine ?a ?b P /\ (forall u v : SF_seq, P u -> P v -> ball (f0 u) eps (f0 v))) < -> (exists y : ?U, filterlim f0 (Riemann_fine ?a ?b) (locally y)) where ?U : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- CompleteSpace] ?a : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- R] ?b : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- R]
ex_RInt_ext : forall (f0 g : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a0 b0 < x < Rmax a0 b0 -> f0 x = g x) -> ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 -> ex_RInt g a0 b0 where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
ex_RInt_continuous : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), (forall z : R, Rmin a0 b0 <= z <= Rmax a0 b0 -> continuous f0 z) -> ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 where ?V : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
last_unzip1 : forall (x0 : ?S) (y0 : ?T) (s : seq (?S * ?T)), last x0 (unzip1 s) = fst (last (x0, y0) s) where ?S : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type] ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
Proper_StrongProper : forall F : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> ProperFilter' F where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
plus_zero_l : forall x : ?G, plus zero x = x where ?G : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- AbelianGroup]
opp_opp : forall x : ?G, opp (opp x) = x where ?G : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- AbelianGroup]
SF_size_ly : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_ly s) = SF_size s where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
plus_opp_r : forall x : ?G, plus x (opp x) = zero where ?G : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- AbelianGroup]
SF_size_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_size (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = Init.Nat.pred (size P) where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
SF_size_lx : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s) = S (SF_size s) where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
SF_lx_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), (0 < size P)%nat -> SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = P where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
plus_comm : forall x y : ?G, plus x y = plus y x where ?G : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- AbelianGroup]
locally_ball : forall (x : ?T) (eps : posreal), locally x (ball x eps) where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- UniformSpace]
SF_ly_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_ly (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = behead (pairmap f2 0 P) where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]
opp_plus : forall x y : ?G, opp (plus x y) = plus (opp x) (opp y) where ?G : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- AbelianGroup]
filterlim_switch_dom : forall F1 : (?T1 -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F1 -> forall F2 : (?T2 -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F2 -> forall dom : ?T2 -> Prop, (forall P : ?T2 -> Prop, F2 P -> exists x : ?T2, dom x /\ P x) -> forall (f0 : ?T1 -> ?T2 -> ?U) (g : ?T2 -> ?U) (h : ?T1 -> ?U), filterlim (fun (x : ?T1) (y : {z : ?T2 | dom z}) => f0 x (sval y)) F1 (locally (fun y : {z : ?T2 | dom z} => g (sval y))) -> (forall x : ?T1, filterlim (f0 x) (within dom F2) (locally (h x))) ->...-> V a : R b : R |- CompleteSpace]
SF_last_lx : forall (x0 : ?T) (s : SF_seq), fst (SF_last x0 s) = last 0 (SF_lx s) where ?T : [V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R b : R |- Type]

```coq
intros. unfold RInt. unfold ex_RInt. unfold is_RInt.
intros [If HIf].
apply (is_RInt_unique _ _ _ _ HIf).
Qed.```

original: intros. unfold RInt. unfold ex_RInt. unfold is_RInt. intros [If HIf]. apply (is_RInt_unique _ _ _ _ HIf).
